page.title: 04ATTITUDES
page.content:
Attitudes In Thorpe Audlin Peoples attitudes towards Thorpe Audlin vary tremendously.Young people feel that there should be more entertainment in the village.Old people feel that there should be more facilities to get them from one place to another.Parents and middle aged people think that Thorpe Audlin is just right and think that nothing in the village should be changed.This however is only the majority of peoples' feelings,not everyone thinks like this.Most people think that Thorpe Audlin is pretty and pleasant to look at and drive through.Lots of people like it because it has many old buildings and lots of country side.
Alison Abraham Aged l3
